title: TFR Ep. 573: Copshop, The Empty Man, 5 Horror Double Features
description:
This week on The First Run, the bois chat about 'CopShop’. Gerard Butler and an almost unrecognizable Frank Grillo glare it up and make threats in this tough guy action-crime film. Then we kick-off the spooky season with ‘The Empty’ Man," a horror film that hits many different genre beats and ends up in a place completely different from where it started. Do we have an undiscovered horror cult classic in the making? We just might, gentle listeners. We just might. As always, Chris tells you what he thinks the big releases on physical media are, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week. The show is all wrapped up with five horror double features recommendations from each of your esteemed hosts. Don't miss this one or you will be sad and no one wants that.

00:00-11:16: Intro/Copshop

11:17-23:55: Physical Media Picks

23:56-33:40: The Empty Man

33:41-48:37: 5 Horror Double Features

48:38-52:20: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
